post.body: the slate sits blank like a clear blue sky. Take the chalk and create clouds.
yep. :)
Yep. :)
Exactly! Oooo.... bright shiny things....
Las Vegas AT&T wireless subscribers: it's going to be a week of overloaded service. Me: Three dropped calls tonight & slow data speeds.
Blog Alert: Observation: I’m amazed by the amount of real estate professionals turned social me.. http://tinyurl.com/9vly5d
RT: @rww: Did Google Just Expose Semantic Data in Search Results? http://bit.ly/15MMS <- Another step closer to the semantic web
Images successfully hacked. Ahh, there you are, my pretty! :)
RT: @AmandaMooney: Adding a Twitter Challenge to this week: Please give $5 + to this family in need http://tinyurl.com/8m42xc via @armano
The best way to get me to follow you back? Have a page of tweets and a filled out profile block.
The cat & I both agree: Cranberry chicken is nom Nom NOM!
It's a shame that Photoshop & OpenGL is not compatable with my video card. A STANDARD video card.
I have solved my photoshop CS4 problem thanks to this forum: http://tinyurl.com/83xexn
Seeing an ad on facebook for the "National Problem Gambling Hotline." Just becase I live in Vegas, doesn't mean I'm a chronic gambler!
Ding! I pegged it: instructor's first class on BlackBoard. Whee.
Apparently I've exceeded my API limit...
Also thinking that many in the class are new to the program and haven't learned the etiquitte.
Oh, my... methinks this prof is new to the whole Blackboard experience.
It's ADD day in class... whee!
Please edit your inner monologues before posting them, fellow classmates. It's like verbal diahrreha around here!
